sourcesContent:
import {
	Box,
	Button,
	CloseButton,
	Heading,
	HStack,
	Text,
	Input,
	Image,
	Modal,
	ModalBody,
	ModalOverlay,
	ModalContent,
	VStack,
	Badge,
	RadioGroup,
	Stack,
	Radio,
	Checkbox,
	Textarea,
	useDisclosure,
} from "@chakra-ui/react"; 
import { useState } from "react";
import { newMenuItem } from "../../scripts/newMenuItem";
import { DietTags } from "../menu/dietTags";

export const NewMenuItem = () => {
	const { isOpen, onOpen, onClose } = useDisclosure()
	const [menuItem, setMenuItem] = useState("")

	const handleSubmit = async () => {
		const itemObj = JSON.parse(menuItem)
		console.log(itemObj)
		const response = await newMenuItem(itemObj)
	}

	const handleChange = (event) => {
		setMenuItem(event.target.value)
	}

	return (
		<>
			<Button
				size='md'
				height='48px'
				width='200px'
				border='2px'
				borderColor='green.500' onClick={onOpen}>Añadir Nuevo Plato</Button>



			<Modal isOpen={isOpen} onClose={onClose}>
				<ModalOverlay />
				<ModalContent>
					<ModalHeader>Nuevo Plato</ModalHeader>
					<ModalCloseButton />
					<ModalBody>


						<VStack gap={10} >
							<Box  style={{ borderRadius: 10, width: "100%" }} />
							<Stack spacing="5" w="100%" p="5">
								<Heading size="lg">{"name"}</Heading>

								<Textarea placeholder="description"/>


								<DietTags tags={["vegan", "vegetarian"]} />
								<Button> Añadir otra etiqueta</Button>





							</Stack>

							<BottomFloatingButtonGroup />
						</VStack>

					</ModalBody>

					<ModalFooter>
						<Button mr={3} onClick={onClose}>
							Close
						</Button>
						<Button colorScheme='blue' onClick={handleSubmit} >
							Enviar
						</Button>
					</ModalFooter>
				</ModalContent>
			</Modal>
		</>
	)

}
